title: WTC Morse Cage Ti bottle cages get more exclusive with Limited Edition Black or Gold finish
content:
Bored with the raw titanium bottle cage look? No worries, Wolf Tooth Components is back with not one, but two new limited edition finishes for their Morse Cage Ti. The Morse Cage Ti has been cloaked in gold before, but this time the gold cage is a full WTC build. What initially started as a

The post WTC Morse Cage Ti bottle cages get more exclusive with Limited Edition Black or Gold finish appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
